title: Battle Tank - 5 : Sound System
description: Battle Tank - 5 Sound System is the result of the joint work of our experienced programmers and sound designers. More than 90 engine and weapon sounds of MBT T-80 with all the necessary code
longDescription:
VIDEO PREVIEW | HOW TO USE VIDEO | HOW TO USE IT FOR MULTIPLAYER


Experience the thundering power of the Russian main battle tank T-80 like never before with the T-80 Tank 5 Sound System.


  • Fully controllable 3d-model
  • The most realistic engine sounds
  • Different sounds from different RPMs, speed, gear and other vehicle's parameters
  • Weapon sounds from the weapons used by this vehicle in real life
  • Different sounds from different distance
  • Startup and Shutdown sounds
  • Cockpit sounds
  • Multiplayer Replication


About 60 prepared tank sounds authentically capture both the imposing exterior presence and the immersive interior cabin experience of the T-80 tank, delivering an unparalleled level of realism. Over 30 weapon-specific sounds have been expertly integrated for an authentic combat experience. 125mm Smoothbore cannon, the 7.62mm coaxial PKT machine gun, and the strategic deployment of the smoke grenade launcher, designed to conceal the tank from prying enemy eyes.


Our comprehensive solution includes advanced code that dynamically adjusts sound parameters based on in-game variables such as distance from objects, vehicle speed, engine RPMs, and more not only for single-player, but also for multiplayer. This ensures a truly immersive audio environment that seamlessly adapts to the ever-changing conditions of the battlefield.


In our relentless pursuit of audio excellence, we have spared no effort to provide the most authentic tank sound experience possible. We meticulously recorded our own audio samples and combined them with resources sourced from the internet to ensure that every aspect of the T-80's sound profile is faithfully represented.


For UE version 5.3 and below, you can download the demo scene from here. For UE 5.4 and above, the demo scene is already included in the plugin. You just need to adjust the audio settings of the project as shown in the 'How to Use' video.
technicalDetails:
Code Module:Â Tank_5_Sound_System (Runtime Module)

Number of Blueprints: 6

Number of C++ Classes: 6

Network Replicated: Yes

Supported Development Platforms: Windows

Supported Target Build Platforms: Windows


HOW TO USE IT WITH OUR READY-MADE SCENE: VIDEO

﻿HOW TO USE IT FOR MULTIPLAYER: VIDEO

  • Enable "Tank_5_Sound_System" and "ChaosVehiclesPlugin" from "Edit > Plugins". Restart UE
  • Adjust the audio settings of the project as shown in the 'How to Use' video
  • Open 'DemoLevel' from '/Engine/Plugins/Tank_5_Sound_System Content/DemoLevel/DemoLevel.umap'. For UE 5.3 and below you need to download it.
  • DRIVE!!!


Check Tank_5_SFXComponent_BP to adjust any Tank's sound settings.



Support: info@soundfx.studio

Discord: https://discord.gg/HzVuvSuCHr

releaseInfo.releaseNote: UE5.4 update + some fixes. The demo level is included in the plugin.
